channel.title: Class suggestion: The Hermit (neutral offensive)
channel.description:
Hello, here is an idea about a neutral offensive. The idea is, this guy just want to live his life in peace, and retaliate to people annoying him.
Passive: If you get executed by trial, bleed the first one to accuse. If you get executed by prince, bleed him. Passive: Occupy immune. Night ability: Cure yourself from bleeding or poison. Unlimited. Night ability: Occupy and bleed anyone trying to visit you tonight. You are death immune. 3 charges.
Its a bit rough, but would that work out? A little bit of Hunter, a little bit of Alchemist, and something to consider when executing neuts. The cure ability is so he doesnt need to rely on healer, but he can't use both ability the same night.

item.title: Class suggestion: The Hermit (neutral offensive)
item.dc:creator: Rhaz
item.description:
That would be to survive till the end… Some suggested it could be to “trap” people but i don’t know… I mean, he jst wanna live in peace, so it would only be logical he would only want to survive, i guess?
